product_name: Garmin Fenix 2 Special Edition GPS + ABC Heart Rate Monitor Watch
long_description: With an included heart rate monitor and chest strap, the Fenix 2 Special Edition GPS + ABC Heart Rate Monitor is a superior training partner that helps keep you in the zone wherever you workout.
short_description: With an included heart rate monitor and chest strap, the Fenix 2 Special Edition GPS + ABC Heart Rate Monitor is a superior training partner that helps keep you in the zone wherever you workout.
